title: I live in Leland and there is a lot of clear cutting going on, both on Mount Misery and Old Cedar Hill. Is this related to the I-40 extension? Where can I see plans online?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/07/is-the-clear-cutting-around-mount-misery-and-old-cedar-hill-related-to-i-140/
